page.title: 16VILLAGE LIFE,SPARSHOLT.
page.content: The village we live in is called Sparsholt,which is about five miles north of Winchester.There are a lot of old people in the village who have lived there all their lives. Living in a village is good because you know everybody and it is friendly and peaceful.There are quite a number of children to play with. From our village you are able to go for walks in the country and see animals and flowers that you would not see in towns or cities.Crab Wood is only a quarter of a mile from the village.It is normally a quiet village but at the moment some builders are building a new village hall for the primary school to use and anyone else who wants to hire it.The main disadvantage is that there is only a new post office with a small shop attached to it.
